content: I work from home and at least 12 of those reasons are true to my heart and lifestyle! My cats and dog don’t ever care what I look (or perhaps smell) like, how often I sing or talk in accents in response to news stories, jump up to dance at particularly great music, or what bodily functions might embarrass little old Virgo me if I were in the office with humans. Critters are the best office mates!
